name: Alliance Field Kit
description: Standard issue for many Rebel operatives, the Alliance field kit is a rugged satchel containing survival rations, a compact water purifier, climbing line, glowrods, a basic medpac, and a fold-out encoded ident card. The exact contents vary from cell to cell depending on supply lines and local ingenuity. Veterans often add personal modifications: a hidden hold-out blaster, a secret compartment for intel, or a small keepsake from home.
